subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
Please permit me to humbly and respectfully crave your indulgence with your funds. Your unclaimed funds are now domiciled with the Bank of Ghana (BOG), from where they will be released and transferred to you upon completion of the legally requisite protocol towards the formalization of the requisite procedural templates.
I write to you in my capacity as a consultant to the Bank of Ghana, the Economic Community of West Africa States (ECOWAS), and the Government of Ghana on financial matters, in particular, recovering unclaimed funds. I will quickly want you to note the following:
1. Your funds, as already stated, are now securely domiciled with the Bank of Ghana (BOG).
2. Your funds will be transferred to you via bank-to-bank transfer and through the transfer instrumentality of the Bank of Ghana (BOG) upon formalization of the requisite protocols.
3. You are not required or expected to pay any money to any person(s) or office(s) to receive your funds, as your funds will be released and transferred to you once the requisite protocols have been duly formalized.
4. Our inquiries have confirmed that a lot of people are trying to mislead and take advantage of unsuspecting beneficiaries of funds within and outside the African continent. As such, we wish to let you know that you should ignore or stop all forms of communication with any person or office disturbing you with false promises and trying to deceive you into paying or sending money.
It will be in your interest if you can maintain absolute confidentiality in our communication, at all places and at all times, until your matter has been attended to and your funds released and transferred to you.
Regards,
Name and Signature
TOTEM FINANCIAL SERVICES

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my unclaimed funds. I appreciate your efforts in assisting with the recovery process. I understand that my funds are now securely held by the Bank of Ghana BOG, and will be transferred to me once the necessary protocols are completed.

I'm glad to hear that I am not required to pay any money to receive my funds. It's unfortunate that there are people trying to take advantage of others in these situations. I will definitely be cautious and avoid any individuals or offices that may try to deceive me into sending money.

Could you please provide more details about the process and the specific protocols that need to be completed? How long does it usually take for the funds to be released once all the requirements are met?

Thank you again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Filomena

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear Filomena,

I want to confirm the receipt of your mails and the information you have
provided and your identity.

I will get back to you with further details upon your reply to this mail.

I will be writing to you as we go further and upon your reply to this mail
from my official email address (info@totemfinancialservices.com) for
obvious security reasons and to protect over communication.
Regards,
Jacob Adjirackor
Totem Financial Services.
info@totemfinancialservices.com

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Dear Jacob Adjirackor,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and confirmation of my emails and identity. I look forward to receiving further details from you.

Could you please provide me with some more information about Totem Financial Services? I would like to know more about the services you offer and how you can assist me.

Also, could you clarify what you mean by writing to me from your official email address for security reasons? I want to ensure that our communication is secure and protected.

Thank you again, and I await your reply.

Best wishes,
Filomena

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
I want you to carefully and quickly note the below so that you can
understand better.

1.Ecowas(Economic Community of West African States)in its oversight
functions occasioned by complaints from beneficiaries and owners of long
overdue and unclaimed funds have intervened and rescued and recovered a lot
of outstanding funds.These recovered funds are presently deposited with the
Bank of Ghana.

2.Totem Financial Services have been appointed as  financial consultants to
Ecowas/Bank of Ghana on the recovered funds. It is on the basis and
strength of this that I have written to you to let you know that we have
recovered funds in your name.
We are to make sure we are dealing and communicating with the rightful
person and not an impostor hence you are required to provide the following
details to help and enable us to confirm that we are dealing with the
rightful person with the name and not an impostor.

(a). Your Full name and address.And your telephone number.

(b). A copy of your identity.

(c). Any document(s) or details regarding your outstanding funds.

3.It is part of our mandate and responsibility to help beneficiaries or
owners of funds to recover money they may have lost or paid in the course
of their pursuit of their outstanding funds. All you need to do to enable
us to help you recover all or substantial part of the money you may have
lost is for you to provide details of the money you have sent and the
people or offices and places you sent the money.

Finally,please do not bother to respond to this mail if you are not the
person whose outstanding funds have been recovered and if you do not have
any outstanding funds or claims.

Thanks.
Regards,
Jacob Adjirackor
Totem Financial Services.
info@totemfinancialservices.com.

subject: Re: Hello,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to hear about the efforts of the Economic Community of West African States in recovering unclaimed funds. Can you tell me more about how the process works once someone provides their details? How long does it usually take for the rightful owners to access their recovered funds?

Best wishes,
Filomena
